attributes.action: Mandatory political education for all children at school
attributes.additional_details: To ensure the future electorate understands the political system in the UK rather than wasting time with ridiculous petitions such as asking for another general election, 4 months after the last one
attributes.background: Mandatory political education for all children at school as part of the curriculum

rejection.details: Education about politics is already in the national curriculum. If you would like to make a change to the current arrangements, you can start a petition setting out clearly what you would like to change.
